headline: Loria Says 2024 Is a Recovery Year for Box Office
summary: Daniel Loria, SVP Content Strategy and Editorial Director at The Boxoffice Company, says 2024 is a recovery year for the box office and forecasts 2025 will be the best box office year in the post-pandemic era. He speaks with Paul Sweeney and Caroline Hyde on "Bloomberg Markets." (Corrects company name)

headline: Netflix’s Big Game Is Just Getting Started
summary: The company’s foray into live sports caps a strong year, but the stock’s rich valuation sets a high bar for a follow-up act.

headline: The Celebrity Activist Investor Is Going Extinct
summary: An era of big-name activists with fiery personalities waging noisy proxy battles and wielding brash tactics to win board seats is over.  Carl Icahn,  facing attacks on how he manages his own publicly traded firm, has slowed his fire.  Nelson Peltz,  fresh off losing a battle with  Disney  is planning to hand his firm to his less pugnacious son and others.
